document.full_text: a u.s. law from the pick-and-shovel days of the western frontier now threatens natural treasures including grand canyon national park as mining claims on public lands proliferate, an environmental group said on friday.
document.title: 1872 mining law threatens grand canyon
lines_and_colors: a u.s. law from the pick-and-shovel days of the western frontier now threatens natural treasures including grand canyon national park as mining claims on public lands proliferate, an environmental group said on friday.
